HeroSection.name: Nadir Bakhsh
HeroSection.description: Hi, I‚Äôm Nadir Bakhsh, a passionate Fullstack development and specializing in Frontend development with responsive design, and user-friendly web and Apps. With a strong background in React, Remix, Next.js, Tailwind CSS and modern JavaScript libraries, please feel free to connect with me and discuss your project.

experiences.describe: At Now Posh, I worked as a Full Stack Developer and Team Lead, overseeing both frontend and backend development. I led a team of developers, maintained code quality, and optimized workflows for efficient project execution. My role involved building scalable web applications, implementing secure authentication, and integrating RESTful APIs for smooth data exchange. Leveraging React.js, Next.js, and Node.js, I developed high-performance, user-friendly interfaces. Additionally, I conducted code reviews and mentorship sessions, fostering a strong development culture. My contributions enhanced project efficiency, improved application reliability, and accelerated delivery timelines

At Designocracy, I began as a Frontend UI Developer, focusing on creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces while integrating APIs to enhance functionality. My expertise in React.js, Next.js, and modern UI frameworks contributed to streamlined development and improved user experience. Recognizing my contributions, I was promoted to Full Stack Engineer, where I collaborated with backend teams to design REST API data schemas and integrate them into the frontend. Over time, I played a key role in optimizing performance, ensuring scalability, and maintaining high code standards. Later, I advanced to a Part-Time Full Stack Engineer, continuing to build scalable web solutions while mentoring junior developers and conducting code reviews to enhance overall project quality.

work as a part-time freelancer on Upwork, specializing in frontend development with a strong focus on React.js, Next.js, and modern UI frameworks. I have successfully delivered multiple projects with top ratings, ensuring high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly applications. My expertise includes crafting responsive interfaces, optimizing performance, and implementing secure API integrations for seamless user experiences. By following best coding practices, I ensure clean, maintainable, and efficient code. I also contribute to development workflows through code reviews and mentorship. My dedication to client satisfaction and attention to detail help me deliver reliable and high-performing solutions.

For Pikky, I developed both the Restaurant Dashboard and the Mobile Application, ensuring a seamless experience for restaurant owners and customers. The Restaurant Dashboard was built using React.js, providing intuitive order management, analytics, and real-time updates. The Mobile App, developed with React Native, offered a user-friendly interface for placing orders, tracking deliveries, and making secure payments. I implemented authentication and API integrations, ensuring data security and smooth communication between the frontend and backend. Leading code reviews, I maintained high coding standards and optimized performance. Additionally, I mentored junior developers, improving team efficiency and overall project quality.

I developed and maintained scalable React applications, ensuring high performance and efficiency. My role involved implementing robust authentication mechanisms to enhance security. I integrated various APIs seamlessly, optimizing data flow and user experience. Leading code reviews, I provided constructive feedback to improve code quality. I also mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning. These efforts streamlined development workflows and boosted overall team productivity.

bio.title: Who I Am
bio.describe: Nadir Bakhsh, I am a dedicated full-stack developer with more than 7 years of expertise in creating modern web and mobile applications. I focused to developing efficient, scalable, and user-friendly Web & APP, particularly use technologies for frontend like React, Next.js, Remix, and React Native. My passion to create smooth digital experiences for Business who want growth in the world.

bio.title: What I Do
bio.describe: crafting high quality of web & APPs using JavaScript frameworks such as Next.js and React, along with backend solutions powered by Node.js and Nest.js. My skills also include working with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL and Firebase. This ensures the solutions I develop are both resilient and scalable. Additionally, I have a strong proficiency in UI/UX design, utilizing frameworks like Tailwind CSS, Material-UI, and Ant Design to create interfaces.

bio.title: My Education and Experience
bio.describe: completed high school education at Ataturk Public School and intermediate studies at Superior Science College. further enhanced my technical skills by  IT Diploma from SMIT, where I excelled with a top 10 result, reflecting my strong dedication to learning in the field of technology.

bio.title: Achievements and Aspirations
bio.describe: I have received three time ‚ÄúBest Employee of the Month‚Äù awards at Designocracy, and At Posh I was promoted to Team Lead just two months after joining. My portfolio showcases successful projects like Mahaba, Aldi US Dashboard, and Pikky.io. In the future, My aim to continue advancing the fields of web and mobile development, adopting upcoming technologies, and providing outstanding digital solutions.

projects.describe: Pikky is an AI-driven platform designed to enhance the dining experience by connecting restaurants with their guests on a deeper level. It offers personalized food recommendations to diners while providing restaurants with actionable insights to optimize their offerings and operations.
